statements: SELECT * FROM fitness_attendance;
SELECT class_name, instructor FROM fitness_attendance WHERE attendees > 10;
SELECT class_id, date FROM fitness_attendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fitness_attendance WHERE instructor = 'John Smith';
SELECT class_name, attendees FROM fitness_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM fitness_attendance ORDER BY date DESC, attendees DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT class_id, class_name, instructor, date FROM fitness_attendance WHERE attendees > 10 ORDER BY attendees DESC, date ASC;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) as total_attendees FROM fitness_attendance GROUP BY class_name HAVING total_attendees > 5 ORDER BY total_attendees DESC;
SELECT instructor, AVG(attendees) as avg_attendance FROM fitness_attendance GROUP BY instructor ORDER BY avg_attendance DESC;
SELECT * FROM fitness_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY class_id ASC, date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM fitness_classes;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM fitness_classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM class_attendance WHERE attendance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM class_attendance GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT * FROM fitness_classes;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM fitness_classes WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT class_id, COUNT(member_id) AS total_attendees FROM class_attendance GROUP BY class_id;
SELECT class_name, attendance_date FROM fitness_classes JOIN class_attendance ON fitness_classes.class_id = class_attendance.class_id WHERE attendance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT instructor_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, attendance_date)) AS average_days_since_last_attendance FROM fitness_classes JOIN class_attendance ON fitness_classes.class_id = class_attendance.class_id GROUP BY instructor_name;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM FitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_id FROM FitnessClasses ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, attendance_date FROM FitnessClasses JOIN ClassAttendance ON FitnessClasses.class_id = ClassAttendance.class_id;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, attendance_date FROM FitnessClasses JOIN ClassAttendance ON FitnessClasses.class_id = ClassAttendance.class_id WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM FitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM FitnessClasses ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) AS attendee_count FROM FitnessClasses INNER JOIN ClassAttendance ON FitnessClasses.class_id = ClassAttendance.class_id GROUP BY class_name;

SELECT a.attendee_name, fc.class_name FROM Attendees a INNER JOIN ClassAttendance ca ON a.attendee_id = ca.attendee_id INNER JOIN FitnessClasses fc ON ca.class_id = fc.class_id WHERE fc.class_name = 'Yoga';
SELECT fc.class_name, ca.attendance_date FROM FitnessClasses fc INNER JOIN ClassAttendance ca ON fc.class_id = ca.class_id WHERE ca.attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM GroupFitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_date FROM GroupFitnessClasses ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_date FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE class_date >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_classes FROM GroupFitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE class_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ClassAttendance WHERE attendance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT instructor_name, instructor_email FROM Instructors WHERE instructor_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, class_date FROM GroupFitnessClasses ORDER BY class_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM Members WHERE member_id IN (SELECT member_id FROM ClassAttendance WHERE class_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM GroupFitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_schedule FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE max_capacity >= 20;
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_schedule FROM GroupFitnessClasses ORDER BY instructor ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_schedule, max_capacity FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_schedule FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE class_schedule BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM GroupFitnessClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor, class_schedule FROM GroupFitnessClasses WHERE max_capacity > 20 ORDER BY class_schedule DESC;

SELECT c.class_name, i.instructor_name, c.class_schedule, l.location_name FROM GroupFitnessClasses c INNER JOIN Instructors i ON c.instructor = i.instructor_name INNER JOIN ClassLocations l ON l.location_id = c.class_id WHERE c.max_capacity > 15 ORDER BY c.class_schedule ASC;
SELECT ca.category_name, COUNT(*) as total_classes FROM GroupFitnessClasses c JOIN ClassCategories ca ON c.class_id = ca.category_id GROUP BY ca.category_name;

SELECT c.class_name, a.attendee_name, a.attendance_status, a.check_in_time FROM GroupFitnessClasses c JOIN ClassAttendees a ON c.class_id = a.class_id WHERE a.check_in_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY a.check_in_time ASC;
